original_title: 河流 奔跑着 倒映着
overview: There are the images of before, the images of after and the letters. The images of after come first, they stem from the same surveillance camera in Wuhan, empty streets that only throng with people again on April 4th, 2020.
tagline: A new documentary about Wuhan from Zhu Shengze.
title: A River Runs, Turns, Erases, Replaces
